column1: GLK_capital_desc;The three core cities of the Great Lakes Oligarchy are vying to host the formal seat of the goverment. Previously, Milwaukee has been used as an informal meeting location. As the GLO has developed, it is now time to develop a lasting capital.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;

column2: Demand Toledo from the Kingdom of Sandusky

column1: demand_toledo_desc;For far too long have the people of the Great Lakes been separated from the resources and strategic ports in the Toledo Strip. Now that our military is in a favorable position for an offsenive, we should demand the lands be returned to us from Sandusky's empire.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;
